actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: Congratulating the Florida International University Golden Panthers for the school's first Bowl victory.

summary.text: Congratulates the Florida International University (FIU) Golden Panthers football team for their first bowl victory in the Little Caesars Pizza Bowl and their outstanding performance during the 2010 season. Salutes FIU wide receiver Eugene "T.Y." Hilton for winning the Most Valuable Player Award in that game. Commends FIU students, faculty, alumni, and fans for their dedication.

titles.title: Congratulating the Florida International University Golden Panthers for the school's first Bowl victory.
